data.text: @CaulfieldTim @jossreimer @EKOSResearch @VoiceOfFranky @GovCanHealth @ScienceUpFirst @StanKutcher @jonathanstea @BogochIsaac @AntibioticDoc @KrishanaSankar @DrvanTilburg Ekos Research is not science, its polling. Try this https://t.co/Q4uos6l48W

@CaulfieldTim @EKOSResearch @VoiceOfFranky @GovCanHealth @ScienceUpFirst @StanKutcher @jonathanstea @BogochIsaac @AntibioticDoc @KrishanaSankar @DrvanTilburg In an August 2021 poll 56% of Ukrainians did not plan to be vaccinated

@CaulfieldTim @EKOSResearch @VoiceOfFranky @GovCanHealth @ScienceUpFirst @StanKutcher @jonathanstea @BogochIsaac @AntibioticDoc @KrishanaSankar @DrvanTilburg I think the hardest thing to convince people of is that antivaxxers aren't common, they're just extremely loud. Even explicitly pro vaccine accounts don't post dozens of times a day like antivaxxers do.

@CaulfieldTim @jossreimer @EKOSResearch @VoiceOfFranky @GovCanHealth @ScienceUpFirst @StanKutcher @jonathanstea @BogochIsaac @AntibioticDoc @KrishanaSankar @DrvanTilburg I think we should save your tweet until Pfizer releases all the data they’ve been fighting to keep hidden. Because nothing says safe and effective like “no you can’t see our data that proves our products safe and effective.”
